trending_prompts_2025.prompt: A soft-lit cinematic scene of a cozy kitchen in a fantasy cottage, sunlight streaming through stained glass, overflowing with nostalgic charm, hand-drawn anime aesthetic, Studio Ghibli style, vibrant greens and warm oranges, intricate detail.
trending_prompts_2025.trend_context: The 'What if my life was a Ghibli film' trend, popular on TikTok/Instagram.

trending_prompts_2025.prompt: A detailed 3D collectible figurine of a cyberpunk hacker inside a vintage action-figure plastic box, glossy plastic texture, toy packaging theme, high-quality render, 'Gemini 2.5 Nano' aesthetic, studio lighting.
trending_prompts_2025.trend_context: Viral 'Nano Banana' trend turning users into collectible 3D action figures.

trending_prompts_2025.prompt: A cartoonish character making exaggerated Italian hand gestures, fingers pinched together, highly expressive face showing comedic frustration, colorful vibrant background, meme aesthetic, slightly exaggerated features, bright studio lighting.
trending_prompts_2025.trend_context: Humorous depiction of dramatic reactions and stereotypes for Reels/Shorts.

trending_prompts_2025.prompt: Vibrant, chaotic illustration of an alien wearing a rapper-style outfit with oversized chains and sneakers, whimsical and bizarre dreamlike atmosphere, neon color palette, playful narrative, high contrast, adult coloring book clean outlines.
trending_prompts_2025.trend_context: Emerging trend merging high-end surrealism with quirky pop culture.

trending_prompts_2025.prompt: A polished marble statue of a Renaissance angel glowing with ultraviolet light, dark somber background, gothic overtones, hyper-realistic texture, high contrast, 32k resolution, narrative depth.
trending_prompts_2025.trend_context: Fusion of classical art history with high-tech neon dystopian lighting.

trending_prompts_2025.prompt: Modern art deco design featuring bold geometric shapes, rich metallic finishes, symmetrical composition, vibrant 80s synthwave gradients, futuristic architecture, visually pleasing depth.
trending_prompts_2025.trend_context: Updated Vaporwave aesthetic focused on elegant design and luxury finishes.

trending_prompts_2025.prompt: A high-fantasy elven warrior standing on a crystal cliff at dawn, intricate armor with glowing blue runes, panoramic wide shot, soft golden light, inspired by epic Tolkien-esque illustrations, digital oil painting texture.
trending_prompts_2025.trend_context: Consistent demand for high-fidelity world-building and character concept art.
